text: On 3 July 2022, a mass shooting happened at the Field's shopping mall in Copenhagen, Denmark. It killed three people and critically wounded four others. The perpetrator, a Danish man, had a history of mental illness. The mass shooting is the first in Denmark since the 2015 Copenhagen shootings. ==References== Category:July 2022 events Category:21st century in Copenhagen Category:2022 mass shootings Category:2020s crimes in Europe Category:2022 in Europe Category:2022 in Denmark
